page.title: 05DANGER OF EROSION FROM SEA
page.content: THE SANDY RED CLIFF ON THE SOUTH SIDE OF THE DOWN,NEAR THE CAFE,IS RAPIDLY ERODED.THIS IS MAINLY DUE TO THE FORCE OF THE SEA AND IT'S LOAD OF SAND AND PEPPLES,ALTHOUGH THE SCRAMBLING OF POEPLE ON IT FROM RECENT YEARS HAS NOT HELPED.THIS CLIFF WAS HIT BADLY DURING THE DECEMBER STORMS OF 1981 AND HAS ERODED VASTLY IN RECENT YEARS.SINCE THE STORMS IN 1981 SEA DEFENCES(SIMILAR TO THOSE IN BURNHAM), HAVE BEEN CONSTRUCTED.THE EROSION OF THE DOWN IS CENTERED ON THIS SANDY CLIFF,WHERE THE MAIN LINE OF THE COAST MEET THE OUTCROP OF THE DOWN.THE REASON FOR THIS IS THAT BECAUSE OF IT'S POSITION IN THE CORNER THE MAIN POWER OF THE WAVES IS CENTERED HERE.THERE IS ALSO A LITTLE EROSION AT THE END OF THE DOWN BY ABRASION.
